headline: How AI is breathing new life into old tech giants
summary: There are a lot of names investors think of when it comes to artificial intelligence, such as Nvidia (NVDA), Meta (META), and OpenAI (OPAI.PVT). But some classic Big Tech names like Oracle (ORCL) and IBM (IBM) are hot in the AI game too. 17 Asset Management chief investment officer & Water Tower Research managing director Paul Meeks discusses the longtime tech giants that are now seeing big benefits from AI. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts here.
